description: Duosion is known as the Mitosis Pokémon. It is a small,green, circle Pokémon surrounded in green gel. It has a floating portion on top of its main `body`. That is its second brain. When their brains, now divided in two, are thinking the same thoughts, these Pokémon exhibit their maximum power, and since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
name: Doublan
